name: managerially
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that relates to a manager or management: Firing someone in that way was ethically dubious and managerially unwise. They have done a good job managerially. See
managerial
More examplesFewer examplesThe software company was managerially troubled. My concern is that managerially we seem to lurch from one project to another.He was weak creatively, managerially and strategically.
